wikipedia_page.main: Charles Robertson (1844, Walton-on-Thames – 10 November 1891, Godalming) was an English painter and engraver. He focused on landscapes and genre scenes and is best remembered for his Orientalist works.

response: *Charles Robertson (UK politician) (1874-1968), Chair of London County Council
